```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(synapser)
library(readxl)
library(googlesheets4)

synLogin()
```


## CHECKS

Get VBR files

```{r}
hakon_vbr <- read_xlsx(synGet("syn52504777")$path)

hakon_clin_dna <- read_xlsx(synGet("syn44291080")$path)
hakon_clin_rna <- read_xlsx(synGet("syn44291064")$path)

#delete the last few cols since they are for solid tumors
hakon_clinical_all <- hakon_clin_dna %>% 
  rbind(hakon_clin_rna) %>% 
  select(-(`Days to First Event`:`Tumor resection extent`))

```


Confirm all samples have clinical data
```{r}
setdiff(hakon_vbr$`Participant External ID_orig`, hakon_clinical_all$`Participant ID`)
setdiff(hakon_clinical_all$`Participant ID`, hakon_vbr$`Participant External ID_orig`)

hakon_vbr %>% 
  filter(`Participant External ID_orig` %in% hakon_clinical_all$`Participant ID`)
```
